rsStpMib.name: rsStpMib
rsStpMib.contactinfo: Riverstone Networks, Inc 5200 Great America Parkway Santa Clara CA USA 95054 PHONE:+1 408.878.6500 EMAIL: nms-eng@riverstonenet.com WEB: http://www.riverstonenet.com
rsStpMib.description: This mib module defines addtional configuration and statistics for Spanning Tree Protocol Management as defined in RFC 1493 Copyright (C) Riverstone Networks, Inc 2000

RSStpProtocolVersion.name: RSStpProtocolVersion
RSStpProtocolVersion.description: An identifier exists for each type of protocol supported. command variable. Each addtional enumeration should be a power of two.

rsStpGlobals.name: rsStpGlobals
rsStpGlobals.description: Objects of global scope over one or more instances of Spanning Tree in a given switch.

rsStpPortsLevel.name: rsStpPortsLevel
rsStpPortsLevel.description: Objects of port level scope providing information about the Spanning tree on that port.

rsStpStatus.name: rsStpStatus
rsStpStatus.description: The global state of spanning tree protocol on this system. Individual ports may be enabled or disabled as necessary or this master switch can be used to turn all ports on or off. This object will cause a loss of convergence when set.

rsStpProtocol.name: rsStpProtocol
rsStpProtocol.description: Specify the type of Spanning tree to run for the default instance of Spanning Tree. Changing this object has the effect of causing an existing spanning tree to lose convergence.

rsStpProtocolsSupported.name: rsStpProtocolsSupported
rsStpProtocolsSupported.description: Represents range of STP protocols supported. For example the value 6 would mean the switch is capable of both fastSTP(4) + ieee802(2) protocols.

rsStpLastSetErrorReason.name: rsStpLastSetErrorReason
rsStpLastSetErrorReason.description: Reports the agent error code and reason for last failure to set any writable object in this mib. Format of the error code is NNN - reason string where NNN is a numeric identifer.

rsStpLastChanged.name: rsStpLastChanged
rsStpLastChanged.description: The last time any object in this table was changed by SNMP or other local management means.

rsStpBaseTable.name: rsStpBaseTable
rsStpBaseTable.description: This table provides per port control of spanning tree protocol.

rsStpBaseEntry.name: rsStpBaseEntry
rsStpBaseEntry.description: Additional configuration capabilities not found in standard mibs such as configuring STP to run on a given port. All ports shown in dot1dBasePortEntry are capable of bridging, and thus can run STP.

rsStpBaseEnableProtocol.name: rsStpBaseEnableProtocol
rsStpBaseEnableProtocol.description: Set or get the state of spanning tree protocol (send/receive) on the port.

rsStpBaseBlockBpdu.name: rsStpBaseBlockBpdu
rsStpBaseBlockBpdu.description: Set or get the state of BPDU filtering on this port.

rsStpBaseBpduSends.name: rsStpBaseBpduSends
rsStpBaseBpduSends.description: The number of BPDUs sent out on this port.

rsStpBaseBpduReceives.name: rsStpBaseBpduReceives
rsStpBaseBpduReceives.description: The number of BPDUs received on this port.

rsStpBaseGroup.name: rsStpBaseGroup
rsStpBaseGroup.description: A collection of objects providing configuration and monitoring capabilites of Spanning Tree Protocol on a given switch.

rsStpMibCompliance.name: rsStpMibCompliance
rsStpMibCompliance.description: The compliance statement for device support of Priority and Multicast Filtering extended bridging services.
